text: This "Privacy Policy": It will help you understand the following:

Specific clauses of this privacy policy:
1. Definition of applicable scope and related words
(1) Scope of application
This privacy policy is suitable for registered login and browsing users of film and television products and/or services.
But please note that this policy is not applicable to the following situations:
(1) Information collected by a third -party service (including any third -party website) directly provided by the third party through the film and television product and/or service;
(2) Information collected by other companies and institutions that advertise services that provide advertising services in film and television products and/or services;

(3) Film and Television Daquan products and/or services may include or linked information and/or third -party services provided by third parties (including any third -party website).The information has nothing to do with/or services.

We remind you kindly that when you use third -party information and/or services, you should pay attention to and read the relevant user agreements and privacy policies you displayed in the third direction, and provide your personal information properly and carefully.

This privacy policy is only applicable to your personal information collected by us, and it is not applicable to the collection of your personal information of any third party, as well as any third -party service or third -party information use rules.The behavior of third -party collection, storage, and use of your personal information does not bear any responsibility;
(4) Other non -film and television Daquan you are always provided by the products and/or service content.
(2) Related word meaning

(1) Film and Television Daquan Products and/or Services: Film and Television Daquan (hereinafter referred to as "Film and Television") is a content aggregate software that provides a platform for users and media to show their high -quality content.Android, iPad, etc.
(2) Users: It refers to the download and installation and startup, and use this product to call it more "you" in this agreement.

(3) Personal information: Refers to the various information that can be recorded alone or with other information to identify specific natural persons or reflects the activity of specific natural persons alone or with other information.

Facial features), network identity identification information (including account names, account nicknames, IP addresses, and the answers to the aforementioned password, password, password protection), personal property information (including virtual property information such as transactions, consumption records, coupons, and other virtual property),Bank account account, address book information, personal Internet records (including website browsing records, software usage records, click records), personal common equipment information (including hardware models, size, equipment MAC address, operating system type, software list, unique device recognition code(Such as IMEI/Android ID, SIM card IMSI information, process information during operation, etc. describing information about the basic situation of personal equipment in the individual), personal location information (including accurate positioning information).

(4) Personal sensitive information: Refers to personal information that once leaked, illegally provided or abuses the security of people's body and property, and it is easy to lead to personal information such as personal reputation, physical and mental health, or discriminatory treatment.

Personal sensitive information involved in this agreement includes your property information (including virtual property information such as transactions, consumption records, coupons and other virtual property), bank account number, personal biometric information (including fingerprints, facial features), personal identity identification information (including identity identityPersonal information, network identification information (including system accounts, mailbox addresses, and the answers to the aforementioned related codes, password protection answers), other information (including address book information, other information, other information, other information, and other information (including address book information, and other information, other information,Personal phone number, mobile phone number, accurate positioning information, delivery address, web browsing record).
You agree that your personal sensitive information is processed according to the purpose and method described in this agreement.
Compared with other personal information, personal sensitive information may have a greater impact on your personal rights.
We are here to remind you that you need to provide us with your personal sensitive information after careful consideration.

(5) Removal/anonymous processing: Refers to the technical processing of personal information, so that the subject of the personal information cannot be recognized, and the information after processing cannot be restored.
(6) Delete: Refers to removing personal information in a system involved in daily business functions, so that it keeps them from being retrieved and accessible.
(7) Children: Refers to minors under the age of 14.
